key_risks: Environmental impact concerns in fragile ecosystems
Regulatory and geopolitical risks in remote regions
Vulnerability to future global health crises or travel restrictions
Premium pricing model limiting market reach during economic downturns
controversies: Potential environmental degradation in sensitive ecosystems
Risk of greenwashing accusations due to operations in fragile environments
environmental_issues: Operations in fragile ecosystems like Antarctica and Galápagos
Carbon emissions and single-use plastics despite sustainability initiatives
social_issues: Balancing eco-tourism with potential impacts on local communities and ecosystems
governance_issues: Leadership changes with new CEO and CFO appointments
